AMER_DELDUM_INCARNATE_INFUS_1: Incarnate spawns with each memorized non-elemental Infusion
AMER_DELDUM_INFUSEFFECT_ASPECTOFEAGLE_1: +1 to Aspect of the Eagle Infusions
AMER_DELDUM_INFUSEFFECT_ASPECTOFSPIDER_1: +1 to Aspect of the Spider Infusions

AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_FIRE_MEDIUM: -8% Fire Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_FIRE_LARGE: -10% Fire Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_FIRE_GIANT: -12% Fire Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn

AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_WATER_MEDIUM: -8% Water Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_WATER_LARGE: -10% Water Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_WATER_GIANT: -12% Water Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_EARTH_SMALL: -6% Earth Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_EARTH_MEDIUM: -8% Earth Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_EARTH_LARGE: -10% Earth Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_EARTH_GIANT: -12% Earth Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_AIR_SMALL: -6% Air Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_AIR_MEDIUM: -8% Air Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_AIR_LARGE: -10% Air Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_AIR_GIANT: -12% Air Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_POISON_SMALL: -6% Poison Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_POISON_MEDIUM: -8% Poison Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_POISON_LARGE: -10% Poison Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_POISON_GIANT: -12% Poison Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_PHYSICAL_SMALL: -6% Physical and Piercing Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_PHYSICAL_MEDIUM: -8% Physical and Piercing Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_PHYSICAL_LARGE: -10% Physical and Piercing Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_PHYSICAL_GIANT: -12% Physical and Piercing Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_ELE_SMALL: -6% Elemental Resistances on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_ELE_MEDIUM: -8% Elemental Resistances on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_ELE_LARGE: -10% Elemental Resistances on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_ELE_GIANT: -12% Elemental Resistances on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_PIERCING_SMALL: -6% Piercing Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_PIERCING_MEDIUM: -8% Piercing Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_PIERCING_LARGE: -10% Piercing Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNERESIST_PIERCING_GIANT: -12% Piercing Resistance on targets you hit with attacks and spells, until the end of your turn
AMER_DELDUM_RUNEDUMMY_FLAME_MEDIUM:
+1 free Elementalist reaction per round.
+15% critical chance while performing Elementalist reactions
AMER_DELDUM_RUNEDUMMY_FLAME_LARGE:
+1 free Elementalist reaction per round.
+30% critical chance while performing Elementalist reactions
AMER_DELDUM_RUNEDUMMY_FLAME_GIANT:
+1 free Elementalist reaction per round.
+45% critical chance while performing Elementalist reactions
AMER_DELDUM_RUNEDUMMY_FROST_MEDIUM:
+1 free Celestial reaction per round.
Celestial reactions heal another 7% Vitality
AMER_DELDUM_RUNEDUMMY_FROST_LARGE:
+1 free Celestial reaction per round.
Celestial reactions heal another 14% Vitality
AMER_DELDUM_RUNEDUMMY_FROST_GIANT:
+1 free Celestial reaction per round.
Celestial reactions heal another 21% Vitality
AMER_DELDUM_RUNEDUMMY_EARTH_MEDIUM:
+1 free Centurion reaction per round.
Restore 5% of missing armor when performing a Centurion reaction
AMER_DELDUM_RUNEDUMMY_EARTH_LARGE:
+1 free Centurion reaction per round.
Restore 10% of missing armor when performing a Centurion reaction
AMER_DELDUM_RUNEDUMMY_EARTH_GIANT:
+1 free Centurion reaction per round.
Restore 15% of missing armor when performing a Centurion reaction
AMER_DELDUM_RUNEDUMMY_AIR_MEDIUM:
+1 free Predator reaction per round.
+15% damage from Power while performing a Predator reaction
AMER_DELDUM_RUNEDUMMY_AIR_LARGE:
+1 free Predator reaction per round.
+30% damage from Power while performing a Predator reaction
AMER_DELDUM_RUNEDUMMY_AIR_GIANT:
+1 free Predator reaction per round.
+45% damage from Power while performing a Predator reaction
AMER_DELDUM_RUNEDUMMY_VENOM_MEDIUM:
+1 free Occultist reaction per round.
Occultist reactions instantly deal 50% of their base end-damage
AMER_DELDUM_RUNEDUMMY_VENOM_LARGE:
+1 free Occultist reaction per round.
Occultist reactions instantly deal 75% of their base end-damage
AMER_DELDUM_RUNEDUMMY_VENOM_GIANT:
+1 free Occultist reaction per round.
Occultist reactions instantly deal 100% of their base end-damage
AMER_DELDUM_BATTEREDTHRESH_SMALL: -18% to target's Battered threshold for your damage
AMER_DELDUM_BATTEREDTHRESH_MEDIUM: -22% to target's Battered threshold for your damage
AMER_DELDUM_BATTEREDTHRESH_LARGE: -26% to target's Battered threshold for your damage
AMER_DELDUM_BATTEREDTHRESH_GIANT: -30% to target's Battered threshold for your damage
AMER_DELDUM_HARRIEDTHRESH_SMALL: -18% to target's Harried threshold for your damage
AMER_DELDUM_HARRIEDTHRESH_MEDIUM: -22% to target's Harried threshold for your damage
AMER_DELDUM_HARRIEDTHRESH_LARGE: -26% to target's Harried threshold for your damage
AMER_DELDUM_HARRIEDTHRESH_GIANT: -30% to target's Harried threshold for your damage
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_ABSENCE:
- When you manually sneak, recover 1 AP.
- When you kill a non-summon enemy, you can cast Absence once for free (or is used automatically at the end of your turn), which applies up to Dazzled II for 2 turns to enemies within 4m and makes you Invisible and sneaking
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_ABYSS:
- When you perform a Violent Strike, activate Paucity.
- This item has no armor
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_ADAMANT: - After activating Ward, you may cast a second Shields Up skill that costs 2 AP for 1 turn
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_AMARANTHINEBULWARK: - Your Ward grants an additional +12% Physical resistance (+1% per Inertia embodied)
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_ANGELSEGG:
Artifact Power:
- When you activate Purity, cast a Supernova that only harms enemies.
- When an ally you can see dies while you have Purity active, as a 1AP reaction, cast this Supernova at its location
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_ANTEDILUVIANCARAPACE: - +2% (+0.5% per Perseverance) maximum Air, Earth, Fire, and Water resistances
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_APOTHECARYSGUILE:
- Increase the duration of Poisoned statuses you apply by 1 turn.
- Once per round, when you perform a basic attack or skill from sneak that directly targets a Poisoned enemy, damage them with a Curare skill that applies up to Weakened II for 2 turns
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_ARCTURUS:
- Whenever you perform a Centurion reaction, activate Ward.
- Your Ward grants an additional +5% to Physical and Piercing resistances
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_AUSTERITY:
- +20% Physical and Piercing resistance.
- At the start of your turn suffer Water damage equal to 25% of your total Vitality
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_BLACKGLASSBRAND:
- When an attack misses you, apply Brittle and up to Vulnerable III for 2 turns to the attacker.
- Gain +1 free Centurion reaction per round
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_BLOODFORGE: - At the start of your turn, restore 25% of your total Physical and Magic Armor, and receive piercing damage equal to 15% of your total Vitality
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_BOUNTYHUNTER: - When you perform a basic attack from stealth, apply Bounty Hunter for 2 turns: -6% all resistances (-1.5% per Scoundrel)
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_CARNALITY:
- +30% Air, Earth, Fire, Water, and Poison resistance
- At the start of your turn, suffer Piercing damage equal to 15% of your total Vitality
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_CATACLYSM: - Once per round, when you score a critical hit on a Scorched character, cast Supernova
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_CHARITY: - When you affect a character with Benevolence, restore 10% (+1% per Inertia and Life embodied) of its total Vitality, Physical Armor, and Magic Armor
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_CONSECRATION: - Once per round, your Celestial reaction targeting an ally applies Soothing Cold for 2 turns, and creates a 2m blessed water surface beneath it
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_CONVERGENCE: - When you perform a basic attack on an enemy with Charged, gain +100% accuracy while attacking and a 12% chance, per Charged enemy, to cast Lightning Bolt
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_CORUSCATINGSILKS: - 30% of physical damage suffered is instantly regenerated and suffered instead as Air; if armor is depleted, it cannot be recovered in this way
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_DECK:
- Cannot be unequipped during combat.
- You may draw a card for a target, granting it a random Artifact power for 1 round; 13m range, 1 AP cost, 1 turn cooldown.
- Draw a card for yourself on your turn
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_DESPERATION: - Gain +1% movement speed per 1% of Vitality missing
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_DOMINION: - When an enemy you can see becomes Suffocated or Squelched, as a 1 AP reaction apply up to Subjugated III to them for 2 turns
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_DREAD: - Once per round, when an enemy you can see becomes Terrified or Subjugated, gain Dread for 1 turn: +0.3% lifesteal per Strength and your Vitality Void deals additional damage equal to 1% of your total Vitality per Necromancer
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_DROGSLUCK: - While you are Scorched, gain +15% Power and Wits (+4% per Lucky Charm and +2% per Pyrokinetic)
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_ECLIPSE: - When Subjugated III or Terrified III expires naturally on an enemy you can see, as a 1 AP reaction apply Silenced for 2 turns, ignoring armor, to enemies within 5m of them
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_EMPYREANVESTMENTS: - Instantly restore 5% (+0.75% per Memory over 10) of all damage suffered, up to a maximum of 30%. This restoration cannot occur on Armor if it is depleted
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_ETHERTIDE: - When Slowed III, Subjugated III, or Weakened III is applied to a non-boss enemy you can see, as a 1 AP reaction teleport them to your location and apply up to Squelched III for 2 turns
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_EXALTATION: - When an ally you can see, who is affected by Leadership but not Blessed, performs a Violent Strike, as a free reaction apply Blessed for 2 turns to them
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_EXPEDITION:
- Default attacks with this weapon cost -2 AP.
- When you perform a basic attack, gain Windrun until the end of the current turn, granting +2.0 movement and +100% movement speed, but -75% damage
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_EYEOFTHESTORM: - When you become Charged, gain Eye of the Storm for 1 turn: +25% Finesse (+2.5% per Aerotheurge), and once per round, when you perform a Predator reaction, also cast Dazing Bolt
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_FACEOFTHEFALLEN: - Gain "Face of the Fallen" skill, which allows you to destroy corpses to activate your Voracity effects, as well as apply up to Terrified III to enemies within 6m of the corpse
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_FAMINE: - Once per round when you trigger Paucity, pay 2 AP to cast Mosquito Swarm on all enemies in a 5m radius around you
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_FECUNDITY: - When a non-summon character you can see dies in combat, as a 1 AP reaction summon a totem at their corpse
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_FISTOFDECAY:
- You may not equip shields.
- When you perform Sucker Punch, activate Vitality Void and apply up to Vulnerable III for 2 turns to your target
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_GHOSTFLAME: - Once per round, when you perform an Occultist reaction on an enemy with Vulnerable, remove Vulnerable and apply Epidemic of Fire for 1 turn per tier of Vulnerable removed
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_GIANTSSKULL: - 20% of physical damage suffered is instantly regenerated and suffered instead as Earth; if armor is depleted, it cannot be recovered in this way
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_GLACIER: - When you detonate Brittle on an enemy, apply up to Slowed II for 2 turns and deal Water damage equivalent to 5% of its total Vitality, to enemies within 5m of it
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_GLUTTONY: - When a non-totem character dies you become up to Slowed II for 1 turn, but gain +4% lifesteal and +10% damage per corpse within 8m of you, for 2 turns
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_GODSPEED: - When you apply Hasted or Blessed, restore 10% (+3% per 0.25 of your Movement over 2.5) of the target's missing Magic and Physical Armor
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_GOLDFORGE: - While you have Prosperity, gain Volatile Armor: Whenever your armor receives damage, deal 30% of Physical Armor lost as Earth, and 30% of Magic Armor lost as Fire, to all other characters within 3m
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_GOLEM: - If you have Prosperity active at the end of your turn, suffer damage equal to 90% of your total Vitality, split between Earth and Physical; enemies within 3m of you are similarly damaged, using 40% of your total Vitality
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_GRAMSWORDOFGRIEF: - On the first Poisoned character you hit while performing a basic attack, remove Poisoned and deal Poison and Piercing damage to all characters other than you within 3m of them, both equivalent to the damage that would have been dealt over Poisoned's duration (up to 5 turns)
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_HIBERNACULUM: - When you hit a Brittle enemy while performing a basic attack, cast Glaciate on them
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_IMPETUS: - When you Haste an enemy, apply Impetus to them for X turns, where X is the duration of Hasted; when an enemy you can see becomes Hasted, do the same as a 1 AP reaction. Impetus deals Air damage, similar to Ruptured Tendons, when the afflicted character moves
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_INFERNALCONTRACT: - Once per enemy, per round, when you damage a Bleeding enemy that is not Withered, remove Bleeding and apply Withered for 2 turns
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_IRONMAIDEN: - 15% of magic damage suffered is instantly regenerated and suffered instead as physical; if armor is depleted, it cannot be recovered in this way
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_JUDGEMENT: - Once per round when you perform a Violent Strike, also perform the following based on your highest of these Attributes: Finesse, Fan of Knives; Memory, Glaciate; Strength, Whirlwind; Wits, Ignition. If multiple Attributes share the highest value, perform each of their effects
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_KUDZU:
- When you or your summons explode a corpse, apply Poisoned for 2 turns to yourself. Then apply Poisoned and up to Slowed III for 2 turns to other characters within 5m of the corpse.
- While Poisoned gain +10% Earth, +20% Poison, and +10% Physical resistance
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_LAMBENTBLADE: - When you hit an enemy while performing a basic attack: if it is Bleeding, apply Brittle for 1 turn; if it is Charged, apply Scorched for 1 turn; if it is Poisoned, apply Calcifying for 1 turn
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_LEPER: - When you or your summons score a critical hit, apply up to Vulnerable II to yourself and the target for 1 turn
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_LEPER_RUNE:
-Unlocks Inconspicuous.
- When you or your summons score a critical hit, apply up to Vulnerable II to yourself and the target for 1 turn
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_LEVIATHAN:
- While Wet, gain +0.5 movement.
- When you perform a Violent Strike: Source Infusion 1: Teleport each non-boss enemy within 7m to a position nearest you where they can stand, and apply Wet to them and yourself for 3 turns
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_LIGHTSPIRE: - When you spend Source with at least 2 enemies within 5m of you, fire a Lightning Bolt at each of them
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_MALICE: - When you Source Infuse a skill while Scorched, it is considered infused with one more point--if you are capable of infusing at that amount--but you suffer 65% of your total Vitality and armors as Fire damage
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_MALLEUSMALEFICARUM: - When a character you can see casts a Necromancy spell, cast Dazing Bolt on them as a 1 AP reaction
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_MIRAGE: - When you dodge an attack, teleport behind the attacker, become Invisible until the end of its turn, and attempt to Sneak
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_MISERY:
- Whenever Vulnerable is applied to you, apply 2 Battered, and then up to Vulnerable III for 2 turns, to all enemies within 4m.
- When you become Poisoned, apply Vulnerable I to yourself for 1 turn
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_MOMENTUM: - When you perform a basic attack: Source Infusion 1: Fire a piercing projectile per 0.75 movement you have, each dealing 10% of weapon damage
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_MOUNTAIN: - When an un-Taunted enemy you can see scores a critical hit, or damages an allied character to 15% (+1.5% per your Strength) Vitality or less, as a 1 AP reaction, apply Taunted for 1 turn to them
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_NECROMANCERSRAIMENT: - When an enemy you can see becomes Withered, as a 1 AP reaction, summon a corpse beneath them
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_NEMESIS: - When you attack a boss-type creature, you have a 7% chance for each tier of tiered statuses on it to activate Violent Strike
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_NIGHTMARE: - When a character you can see dies, as a 1 AP reaction, apply up to Terrified III (or up to Terrified II if it was a summon) for 2 turns to enemies within 5m of it. Then gain +5% Power per tier of Terrified on enemies in combat with you for 1 turn
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_NIHILITY: - When you apply Terrified III, Vulnerable III, or Weakened III to an enemy, activate Vitality Void
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_OBELISK:
- Unlock Staff of Magus Source Infusions:
1: Also target enemies you can see within 2.5m of the primary target.
2: Also target enemies you can see within 13m and apply Dazzled II for 2 turns
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_OCCAM:
- While performing a basic attack, when you hit an enemy with 15% Vitality or less (7.5% for bosses), it dies.
- Source Infusion 1: Extend this effect to 30% Vitality (11% for bosses).
- Source Infusion 2: Extend this effect to 50% Vitality (15% for bosses)
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_ONSLAUGHT: - When a non-summon enemy dies, gain Onslaught for 2 turns, granting +3% Power and Finesse per 0.2 movement over 2.0
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_OUROBOROS: - When you damage yourself, instantly restore half that amount as Vitality
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_PARAGON:
- Your Vitality Void now activates on non-summon allies instead of yourself, using their Vitality, and dealing 25% (+4% per Leadership) of its damage, up to 65%.
- After moving 3 or more stacks of Battered or Harried via Benevolence in a round, activate Vitality Void
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_PARIAH: - When you become Battered or Harried, gain Pariah for 1 turn, granting +4.5% Constitution per stack of Battered and +4.5% Power per stack of Harried
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_PESTILENCE:
- When Poisoned ends on an enemy you can see, as a 1 AP reaction, apply Poisoned for 2 turns to it.
- When you apply Poisoned, deal Piercing damage and apply Bleeding for 2 turns to enemies within 2m of that target
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_PRISMATICBARRIER: - While Prosperity is active, gain +3% elemental resistance per Perseverance
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_PROPHECY: - When you become Prepared, recover 1 more AP, and for 1 turn gain +3% dodge per Telekinesis and +0.25% dodge per initiative
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_PYRE: - When you or your summons explode a corpse, grant the Firebrand aura (as-per the Firebrand skill) for 2 turns to whoever exploded it
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_RAPTURE: - Once per round, when you perform a Celestial reaction, activate Purity; or, if Purity has remaining cooldown duration, remove one turn from it instead
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_REDORISON:
- When an ally performs a Celestial reaction on an ally you can see, as a 1AP reaction, apply Blessed for 2 turns to that target.
- When an ally performs an Occultist reaction on an enemy you can see, as a 1AP reaction, apply Cursed for 2 turns to that target
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_RODOFABEYANCE:
- When you activate Abeyance, apply up to Weakened II for 2 turns to enemies within 5m.
- When you abey 60% or more of your total Vitality, your reactions do not cost AP while Abeyance is active
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_RODOFCOMMAND: - When you perform a Violent Strike on an enemy with Ataxia, apply up to Subjugated III for 2 turns
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_RODOFCONVICTION: - When you perform Shields Up, gain Volatile Armor for 2 turns: When damaged, deal physical damage equivalent to 50% of the physical armor lost, to characters within 3m
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_SALAMANDER: - 20% of physical damage suffered is instantly regenerated and suffered instead as Fire; if armor is depleted, it cannot be recovered in this way
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_SANGUINEHARVEST: - When you heal an ally while casting a skill, you have a 5% chance per Memory over 10 to activate Violent Strike on them. This effect may only occur once per round on each ally
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_SERAPH:
- Gain +1 free Celestial reaction per round.
- Your Celestial reactions on allies grant +1 turn of Source generation to the target
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_SERENITY: - When you activate Purity, remove all tiered statuses from yourself. Then restore 15% of your Vitality and armors
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_SILKCLIMB: - When you receive damage exceeding 20% of your total Vitality, create a 3m web surface on yourself, applying up to Slowed II to characters within, and teleport up to 4m away from the damage source, to a valid location you can see
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_SMOTHER:
- When you manually sneak, recover 1 AP.
- When performing basic attacks from Sneak, apply up to Subjugated III for 2 turns, to enemies you hit
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_THEBUTCHERSDISCIPLE: - When your offhand is free, gain 1% Critical Chance per Strength over ten
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_THEBUTCHERSWILL: - When you perform a Violent strike, deal irresistible Physical damage equivalent to 10% (+0.35% per Strength over 10) of the target's current Vitality. This damage is halved against boss-type enemies
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_THECANNIBAL: - When you perform a basic attack on an ally, apply Feast to them and yourself for 3 turns. Feast grants +5% damage and +2% lifesteal per character with Feast. As a 1 AP reaction at the end of their turn, characters with Feast cast Mosquito Swarm on the nearest character they can see within 13m, spreading Feast if it is an ally
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_THECHTHONIAN: - When you perform a basic attack, you have a 15% chance (+1% per Strength over 10) to also deal 60% of weapon damage in a 25 degree, 10m long cone
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_THECRUCIBLE: - When you cast Corpse Explosion, apply Immolation for 2 turns to characters within 4m of your target
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_THEJAGUAR:
- At the start of each round, gain +3 Initiative per Bleeding enemy.
- Your Bleeding statuses deal double damage.
- While sneaking, gain +2 movement and +2 AP maximum
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_THELOCUSTCROWN: - Whenever an enemy you can see becomes Withered, apply Corroding for 1 turn to them as a free reaction
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_THESAVAGE:
- When you perform a basic attack with 3 or more enemies within 4m of you, also perform a Whirlwind
- You suffer a -1 penalty (or -2 for Lone Wolves) to Aerotheurge, Geomancer, Hydrosophist, Necromancer, Pyrokinetic, and Summoning
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_THEVAULT:
- Whenever you have at least 3 AP as a combat round begins (before your turn), gain 1 turn of Source Generation.
- When gaining a Source point, restore 0.75% of total Physical Armor per Strength and 0.75% of total Magic Armor per Memory
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_THIRST: - Once during any action, when you score a critical hit on a Bleeding enemy, recover 1 AP and lose 1 Constitution for 1 turn. This penalty stacks, and its duration resets upon stacking
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_THORNHALO: - 15% of magic damage suffered is instantly regenerated and suffered instead as piercing; if armor is depleted, it cannot be recovered in this way
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_TRAMPLE:
- Increase the duration of Bleeding statuses you apply by 1 turn.
- After using a "rush"-type skill, apply to enemies within 3m: 1 Battered per Bleeding enemy hit during the rush, and up to Ataxia III
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_TUNDRA: - 20% of physical damage suffered is instantly regenerated and suffered instead as Water; if armor is depleted, it cannot be recovered in this way
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_URGENCY: - For the first 30 seconds of your turn, you have +0.3 movement and +10% damage per Force embodied; gain 7 more seconds whenever you use a skill
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_VERTIGO:
- +20% invested Finesse.
- When you perform a basic attack, apply Drunk to yourself for 1 turn.
- While Drunk, each point of Finesse over ten grants +1% more dodge but -0.5% accuracy
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_VORTEX: - Once per round, when you activate Vitality Void and no targets are hit by it, it instead hits the nearest enemy you can see within 8m. Then, if that enemy is not a boss, try to teleport it to a position nearest you where it can stand. If Paucity is not active for you, pay 15% of your total Vitality to activate this effect
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_WENDIGO:
- Gain +1 free Predator reaction per round.
- Whenever you hit a Brittle target during a Predator reaction, apply up to Ataxia III for 2 turns, then cause Brittle to detonate
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_WINTERSGRASP: - Once per round, when you hit a Brittle enemy while performing a basic attack, remove surfaces within 3m of it and create ice in that space. Then shatter the ice (as per the "Shatter" spell, ~50% of its damage)
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_WRAITH: - Once while performing a basic attack, when you hit, recover 1 AP and teleport behind a random enemy (excluding this target) you can see within 8m. Basic attacks can never cost less than 2AP
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_ZEAL: - When you perform All In or Flurry, recover 2AP. Then perform basic attacks, each recovering half their cost, randomly targeting characters within range until you no longer have sufficient AP. Basic attacks can never cost less than 2AP
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_ZENITH: - When you hit an enemy while performing a basic attack, you have a 30% chance to launch a Fireball at it
AMER_ARTIFACTPOWER_ZODIAC: - When you perform a Celestial reaction, emulate the effects of Chain Lightning on that target. When an ally performs a Celestial reaction on a target you can see, do the same as a free reaction
AMER_FREESNEAK_WITHINVIS: Sneaking, and become Invisible until the end of your turn. If used while out of combat, become Invisible
HEALING_ELIXIR:
Healing Elixir
- Cleanses Squelched, Poisoned, Bleeding, Scorched, Brittle, Acid, Suffocating, Cursed, and Plague
AMER_ARTIFACT_DECK_PENDINGDRAW: Anomaly: About to Draw a Card
